name: Phantasmal wards
effects: 50% chance to counter physical attacks with physical damage (1.5x, MAG) to the rest of the party for 3 turns (max 1 / turn)

name: Phantasmal wards
幻影守護
유령의 방
Zone fantomatique
Phantasmagorischer Schutz
Guardias fantasmales
desc_short: Add chance of countering when allies other than self receive a physical attack for three turns
3回合內除自身以外的隊員受到物理攻擊時一定機率進行反擊
전투 시작 후 3턴 동안, 아군이 물리공격을 받으면 일정 확률로 맞받아치기 발동
Augmente les chances de contrer lorsque des alliés autres que le lanceur reçoivent des dégâts physiques pendant trois tours
Drei Runde Chance auf Konter, wenn Verb. (außer Benutzer) phys. angegriffen werden.
Posibilidad de contratacar cuando los demás aliados reciban ataques físicos durante tres turnos
